title: Are these enemy /remake games affecting my placements?
body:
I WANT to say no but I only have two actual games played and I am 3/9 progression on the mission "The Journey Begins (2 of 2)". Obviously, it won't count them as actual wins but if they alter the hidden MMR in any way, shape, or form, I feel like that's something I really should be made aware of.

True, missions and actual ranked play may be two entirely separate part of the game but if they just so happen to PERHAPS draw a miniature conclusion based off of some offshoot, random little detail that would otherwise prove entirely unimportant...well...I'm seriously worried.

replies.body: AFAIK if someone else is AFK and your team votes for a remake, it shouldn't count as a loss or affect your MMR. As long as YOU weren't AFK and the cause of the remake that is.
It's just a bug with the mission (had this happen on my other account). It doesn't count towards your placements/mmr, you'll still need to play 10 games.
